press_button.description: Press the printer button to turn it on or off.

clean_button.description: Clean the printer button to ensure proper functioning.

rotate_toggle_button.description: Rotate the toggle button to change the printer setting.

clean_toggle_button.description: Clean the toggle button to maintain its smooth functioning.

clean_printer_body.description: Clean the printer body to remove dust and keep the printer in good condition.

clean_whole_printer.description: Clean the entire printer including the body, buttons.

use_printer.description: Press the printer button to turn it on, rotate the toggle button to set the mode, and then press the button again to start printing.
